notes.text: We now ensure that the empty row in a grid table remains at the last position, even after new rows are created by pasting data to the table
We've resolved an issue with the calculation of the target entity name that led to incorrect recommendations
We now correctly set the focus on the target field once the user clicks the warning message on the popover
The PresentationVariant API can now also be used with TreeTable and AnalyticalTable
We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
We now re-trigger the side effects for actions that fail due to strict handling with multiple messages for a single context
We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Chart building block
We've resolved an issue with using the checkbox control when collaborative draft is enabled
We now provide a setter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
We now provide a getter method for the SelectionVariant in the Table building block
We now ensure an OData query is no longer sent when technical keys are provided as URL parameters for launching an application
You can now set a request size limit for the export in a table using the exportRequestSize setting in the manifest or in the Macro table
We have resolved an issue with displaying the Field building block when its semantic object is defined using a formatter
You can now add formatters to the UI adaptation projects to control the enablement and visibility of actions
You can now disable copying to clipboard in a table using the disableCopyToCliboard setting in the manifest
We've resolved an issue with the setRecommendations API where the recommendations weren't always displaying correctly for all fields.
We now support the RequestAtLeast annotation in the analytical table
We no longer display the row count indicator in tables with a quick filter
You can now configure the x-axis of a chart as the time axis in the content area of an analytical list page
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue related to templating on custom columns
You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the list report
Range pasting is now available for grid tables
We now support dynamic expressions in semantic object annotations
We have resolved an issue that didn't allow the user to execute the copy action twice
Title binding now works properly if the value is a path with conditions
We now ensure the handling of NavigationRestriction is in line with the protocol
